channel.title: mDNS protocol :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Windows : You may need the bonjour protocol installed on your machine, you can download from here and/or use a dedicated browser like Bonjour browser for Windows OSX : It is supported out of the box but need to use some application like discovery-dns-sd-browser search for esp3d Linux: Avahi service must be installed, check this wiki Android: mdDNS Discovery search for esp3d
